text: Sergey Rostislavovich Fokichev () (born 4 February 1963 in Cherepovets) is a former Russian speed skater who represented the USSR at the 1984 Olympics of Sarajevo, where he won the 500 m. He trained at VSS Trud and later at the Armed Forces sports society in Moscow. He was awarded the Order of the Badge of Honor in 1984. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1963 births Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic speed skaters of the Soviet Union Category:Speed skaters at the 1984 Winter Olympics Category:Speed skaters at the 1988 Winter Olympics Category:Soviet male speed skaters Category:Living people Category:People from Cherepovets Category:Olympic medalists in speed skating Category:Medalists at the 1984 Winter Olympics Category:Russian male speed skaters
title: Sergey Fokichev
